<style>
    .header-container {
        background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.95);
        width: 100%;
        padding: 15px 30px;
        position: fixed;
        top: 0;
        left: 0;
        box-shadow: 0 2px 10px rgba(0, 255, 0, 0.1);
        backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
        z-index: 1000;
    }

    .header-content {
        max-width: 1400px;
        margin: 0 auto;
        display: flex;
        justify-content: space-between;
        align-items: center;
    }

    .logo-container {
        flex: 0 0 auto;
    }

    .logo-image {
        height: 60px;
        width: auto;
        transition: transform 0.3s ease;
    }

    .logo-image:hover {
        transform: scale(1.05);
    }

    .nav-container {
        flex: 1;
        display: flex;
        justify-content: flex-end;
    }

    .nav-list {
        list-style: none;
        margin: 0;
        padding: 0;
        display: flex;
        gap: 40px;
        align-items: center;
    }

    .nav-link {
        color: #00FF00;
        text-decoration: none;
        font-size: 16px;
        font-weight: 600;
        padding: 8px 0;
        position: relative;
        transition: all 0.3s ease;
        text-transform: uppercase;
        letter-spacing: 0.5px;
    }

    .nav-link:after {
        content: '';
        position: absolute;
        width: 0;
        height: 2px;
        bottom: 0;
        left: 0;
        background-color: #00FF00;
        transition: width 0.3s ease;
    }

    .nav-link:hover:after {
        width: 100%;
    }

    /* Dropdown Styles */
    .dropdown {
        position: relative;
    }

    .dropdown-content {
        display: none;
        position: absolute;
        background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.95);
        min-width: 220px;
        box-shadow: 0 8px 24px rgba(0, 255, 0, 0.15);
        border-radius: 4px;
        border: 1px solid rgba(0, 255, 0, 0.2);
        top: 100%;
        left: 50%;
        transform: translateX(-50%);
        padding: 8px 0;
        opacity: 0;
        transition: opacity 0.3s ease;
        backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
        z-index: 1002;
    }

    .dropdown:hover .dropdown-content {
        display: block;
        opacity: 1;
    }

    .dropdown-link {
        color: #00FF00;
        text-decoration: none;
        padding: 12px 20px;
        display: block;
        font-size: 15px;
        font-weight: 500;
        text-align: left;
        white-space: nowrap;
        transition: all 0.2s ease;
    }

    .dropdown-link:hover {
        background-color: rgba(0, 255, 0, 0.1);
        padding-left: 25px;
    }

    .submenu {
        left: 100%;
        top: -8px;
        transform: none;
    }

    .dropdown:hover > .dropdown-content.submenu {
        display: block;
    }

    /* Mobile Menu Toggle */
    .menu-toggle {
        display: none;
        background: none;
        border: none;
        cursor: pointer;
        padding: 5px;
        margin-left: 10px;
        z-index: 1003;
    }

    .menu-toggle span {
        display: block;
        width: 25px;
        height: 3px;
        margin: 5px 0;
        background: #00FF00;
        transition: all 0.3s ease;
    }

    /* Responsive Styles */
    @media (max-width: 1024px) {
        .nav-list {
            gap: 30px;
        }
        .nav-link {
            font-size: 15px;
        }
    }

    @media (max-width: 768px) {
        .header-container {
            padding: 10px 20px;
        }
        .menu-toggle {
            display: block;
        }
        .nav-container {
            position: fixed; /* Changed from absolute to fixed */
            top: 80px;
            left: 0;
            width: 100%;
            background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.95);
            max-height: 0;
            overflow: hidden;
            transition: max-height 0.5s ease;
            z-index: 1001;
            backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
        }
        .nav-container.active {
            max-height: 85vh; /* Limit height to prevent overflow issues */
            overflow-y: auto;
            box-shadow: 0 5px 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
        }
        .nav-list {
            flex-direction: column;
            align-items: flex-start;
            width: 100%;
            padding: 20px;
            gap: 15px;
        }
        .nav-link {
            font-size: 16px;
            width: 100%;
            display: block;
            padding: 10px 0;
            position: relative;
        }
        /* Remove underline animation for mobile */
        .nav-link:after {
            display: none;
        }
        /* Add explicit plus indicator for dropdowns */
        .dropdown > .nav-link:before {
            content: '+';
            position: absolute;
            right: 10px;
            top: 50%;
            transform: translateY(-50%);
            font-size: 18px;
            font-weight: bold;
            color: #00FF00;
            pointer-events: none;
        }
        .dropdown.active > .nav-link:before {
            content: '−'; /* Using minus sign instead of rotating plus */
        }
        .dropdown-content {
            position: static;
            width: 100%;
            transform: none;
            border: none;
            box-shadow: none;
            max-height: 0;
            overflow: hidden;
            opacity: 1;
            display: block;
            padding: 0;
            margin-left: 15px;
            transition: max-height 0.3s ease;
            z-index: 1;
        }
        .dropdown.active .dropdown-content {
            max-height: 1000px;
            padding: 8px 0;
        }
        .dropdown-link {
            padding: 10px 15px;
            position: relative;
        }
        /* Style submenu dropdowns in mobile */
        .dropdown-content .dropdown > .dropdown-link {
            padding-right: 30px; /* Space for plus indicator */
        }
        .dropdown-content .dropdown > .dropdown-link:before {
            content: '+';
            position: absolute;
            right: 10px;
            top: 50%;
            transform: translateY(-50%);
            font-size: 18px;
            font-weight: bold;
            color: #00FF00;
            pointer-events: none;
        }
        .dropdown-content .dropdown.active > .dropdown-link:before {
            content: '−'; /* Using minus sign instead of rotating plus */
        }
        /* Fix submenu position */
        .submenu {
            position: static;
            margin-left: 15px;
        }
    }

    @media (max-width: 480px) {
        .header-container {
            padding: 8px 15px; /* Reduce padding for smaller screens */
        }
        .header-content {
            flex-direction: row;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: space-between;
        }
        .logo-image {
            height: 45px;
        }
        .nav-container {
            top: 62px; /* Adjust based on header height */
        }
        /* Better spacing for dropdown items */
        .dropdown-content {

<!-- JavaScript for Mobile Menu -->
<script>
    document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
        const menuToggle = document.querySelector('.menu-toggle');
        const navContainer = document.querySelector('.nav-container');
        const dropdowns = document.querySelectorAll('.dropdown');
        
        // Toggle mobile menu
        menuToggle.addEventListener('click', function() {
            navContainer.classList.toggle('active');
            // Prevent body scrolling when menu is open
            document.body.style.overflow = navContainer.classList.contains('active') ? 'hidden' : '';
        });
        
        // Handle dropdowns on mobile
        dropdowns.forEach(dropdown => {
            const link = dropdown.querySelector('.nav-link, .dropdown-link');
            link.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
                if (window.innerWidth <= 768) {
                    if (dropdown.classList.contains('dropdown') && 
                        dropdown.querySelector('.dropdown-content')) {
                        e.preventDefault();
                        e.stopPropagation(); // Prevent event bubbling
                        
                        // Close other same-level dropdowns
                        const parentUl = dropdown.parentNode;
                        const siblings = parentUl.querySelectorAll(':scope > .dropdown');
                        siblings.forEach(sibling => {
                            if (sibling !== dropdown) {
                                sibling.classList.remove('active');
                            }
                        });
                        
                        dropdown.classList.toggle('active');
                    }
                }
            });
        });
        
        // Close menu when clicking outside
        document.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
            if (window.innerWidth <= 768 && 
                !navContainer.contains(e.target) && 
                !menuToggle.contains(e.target) && 
                navContainer.classList.contains('active')) {
                navContainer.classList.remove('active');
                document.body.style.overflow = '';
            }
        });
        
        // Update menu behavior on window resize
        window.addEventListener('resize', function() {
            if (window.innerWidth > 768) {
                navContainer.classList.remove('active');
                dropdowns.forEach(dropdown => {
                    dropdown.classList.remove('active');
                });
                document.body.style.overflow = '';
            }
        });
    });
</script>

data-animation-class><div><p><br>In response to parent feedback about sensory sensitivities preventing their children from attending our events, EOP collaborated with Ali to create sensory-friendly experiences. </p><p></p><p>Ali consulted parents of autistic children to identify key obstacles: large crowds, rapid flashing lights, loud and unexpected sounds, and the lack of a safe space.</p><p></p><p>EOP addressed these issues by scheduling events at quieter times, modifying lights and sound for gentle transitions, lowering music volume, and designating a calm area for breaks.</p></div></div><!----><!----><!----><span></span><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----></div><!--]--><!--]--></div><!----><!----><!----><!----><span></span><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----></div><!--]--><!--]--></div><!----><!----><!----><!----><span></span><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----></div><!--]--><!--]--></div><!----><!----><!----><!----><span></span><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----></div><!--]--><!--[--><div col-sN1LBQ1RrdX" id="col-sN1LBQ1RrdX"><!----><!----><div class="vertical inner"><!----><!--[--><!--[--><div id="sub-heading-HiLCOYU-2kh" class="c-sub-heading c-wrapper desktop-only"><!----><!----><!----><div class="sub-heading-HiLCOYU-2kh text-output csub-heading-HiLCOYU-2kh noBorder radius0 none" data-animation-class><div><p><br><strong>SENSORY FRIENDLY PRICING</strong></p><p><br>We understand the importance of making Sensory Friendly Events engaging yet calming. With flexible pricing and customizable options, Emerald Owl Productions will work with your team to design an event tailored to sensory needs, all within your budget including foam, gunge, and other fun activities. Our package deals for multiple events can also help reduce costs, while providing continuity in planning for future sensory-friendly gatherings. Get in touch to discuss your goals—together, we can create a memorable yet soothing experience for all attendees!</p></div></div><!----><!----><!----><span></span><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----></div><!--]--><!--[--><div id="sub-heading-80a-kGecwI" class="c-sub-heading c-wrapper mobile-only"><!----><!----><!----><div class="sub-heading-80a-kGecwI text-output csub-heading-80a-kGecwI noBorder radius0 none" data-animation-class><div><p><br><strong>SENSORY FRIENDLY PRICING</strong></p><p></p><p>Laser shows are unique entertainment options with pricing similar to buying a house or planning a wedding—you need details to get an accurate quote. Different needs and budgets can be accommodated, scaling the spectacle up or down. To discuss a laser show for your event, call us at 252-764-7628 without any sales pressure. During the call, we'll discuss your objectives, desired show type (beam, graphic or combo), venue specifics, anticipated audience size, sound and power requirements, location, whether it’s a solo event, customized music needs, and your budget. Our talented programmers design shows to music and offer package deals for multi-night events, reducing the cost per night significantly. One-time shows are pricier due to fixed overheads, but shared packages or revenue-split events can make them more affordable. At Emerald Owl Productions, we aim to find the right balance for a memorable laser show experience within your budget—multiple nightly shows also hardly impact the price. Once we have the initial details, future planning becomes simpler. We strive to overcome pricing challenges and bring your event to life, so let's collaborate!</p></div></div><!----><!----><!----><span></span><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----></div><!--]--><!--]--></div><!----><!----><!----><!----><span></span><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----></div><!--]--><!--]--></div><!----><!----><!----><!----><span></span><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----></div><!--]--><!--[--><div CHEELY - Director of Partnership Development - ​Director of Neurodivergent Events\u003C/h4>","\u003Cp>Phone: (252)570-9453\u003C/p>\u003Cp>Email: \u003Ca target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer nofollow\" href=\"mailto:ali@emeraldowlproductions.com\">ali@emeraldowlproductions.com\u003C/a>\u003C/p>\u003Cp>\u003C/p>\u003Cp>Ali Cheely is a mother of 4 children, 3 of which have special needs, including neurological differences. Ali brings her teaching and coaching experience from school, church, and home settings to EOP. She has worked with children and adults with autism, Down syndrome, Split brain syndrome, Cerebral palsy, OCD, ADHD, global cognitive delays, and short stature/dwarfism. Ali has also worked with individuals who are non verbal and non ambulatory.\u003C/p>\u003Cp>\u003C/p>\u003Cp>\"I know how hard it is when you feel there are no events that meet the unique needs of your kids. As Director of Neurodivergent Events, my job is to create specific experiences that meet the needs of populations that are often overlooked by event planners. It is truly humbling to use my knowledge and background to create memories via epic events for these populations.\"\u003C/p>","https://assets.cdn.filesafe.space/d2BYZGOF7ecSj21A0t4N/media/67144f7bf312d46538860eaa.jpeg",{"value":837},"var(--contentfont)",{"value":839},{"openIcon":840,"closeIcon":844,"iconPosition":847,"lineHeight":848,"showImagePopup":65,"expandAllToggle":57,"expandAll":65,"firstItemOpen":57},{"color":47,"fontFamily":841,"name":842,"unicode":843},"Font With flexible pricing and customizable options, Emerald Owl Productions will work with your team to design an event tailored to sensory needs, all within your budget including foam, gunge, and other fun activities. Different needs and budgets can be accommodated, scaling the spectacle up or down. To discuss a laser show for your event, call us at 252-764-7628 without any sales pressure. During the call, we'll discuss your objectives, desired show type (beam, graphic or combo), venue specifics, anticipated audience size, sound and power requirements, location, whether it’s a solo event, customized music needs, and your budget. Our talented programmers design shows to music and offer package deals for multi-night events, reducing the cost per night significantly. One-time shows are pricier due to fixed overheads, but shared packages or revenue-split events can make them more affordable. At Emerald Owl Productions, we aim to find the right balance for a memorable laser show experience within your budget—multiple nightly shows also hardly impact the price. Once we have the initial details, future planning becomes simpler. Home Our Experiences Laser Light Show The Safest Experience in the Sky Unique Benefits of Hosting a Laser Show Neon Nights Foam Parties Water Games Dripping in Confidence Gunge Sensory Friendly Experiences Do It Now Coming Soon Special Occasions Upcoming Events Holiday Events America's 250th Anniversary Fundraisers Emmy The Owl Contact Us More... Our Story Our Team Gallery Blog Careers Sensory Friendly Experiences Sensory Friendly Experiences Plan An Event That Can Include Everyone Pilot Event Experience Drive-in laser shows are a popular, weather-resistant entertainment option since 2020, with benefits like no noise worries and functionality in light rain. Customers love the stress-free, profitable drive-in experience, offering multiple nightly events and organized parking. Enjoy shows up to 45 minutes from your car, with radio-transmitted sound and optional sound systems, plus tailgating opportunities. Rain enhances the show without affecting comfort. Scale up easily for extra value and customize the event to your theme. Call 833-GLOW-EOP for versatile pricing based on venue size, power, and duration—the longer the event, the better the rate. ALI CHEELY - Director of Partnership Development - ​Director of Neurodivergent Events Phone: (252)570-9453 Email: [email protected] Ali Cheely is a mother of 4 children, 3 of which have special needs, including neurological differences. Ali brings her teaching and coaching experience from school, church, and home settings to EOP. She has worked with children and adults with autism, Down syndrome, Split brain syndrome, Cerebral palsy, OCD, ADHD, global cognitive delays, and short stature/dwarfism. Ali has also worked with individuals who are non verbal and non ambulatory. "I know how hard it is when you feel there are no events that meet the unique needs of your kids. As Director of Neurodivergent Events, my job is to create specific experiences that meet the needs of populations that are often overlooked by event planners. It is truly humbling to use my knowledge and background to create memories via epic events for these populations." What Separates This From Others In response to parent feedback about sensory sensitivities preventing their children from attending our events, EOP collaborated with Ali to create sensory-friendly experiences. Ali consulted parents of autistic children to identify key obstacles: large crowds, rapid flashing lights, loud and unexpected sounds, and the lack of a safe space. EOP addressed these issues by scheduling events at quieter times, modifying lights and sound for gentle transitions, lowering music volume, and designating a calm area for breaks. SENSORY FRIENDLY PRICING We understand the importance of making Sensory Friendly Events engaging yet calming. With flexible pricing and customizable options, Emerald Owl Productions will work with your team to design an event tailored to sensory needs, all within your budget including foam, gunge, and other fun activities. Our package deals for multiple events can also help reduce costs, while providing continuity in planning for future sensory-friendly gatherings. Get in touch to discuss your goals—together, we can create a memorable yet soothing experience for all attendees! SENSORY FRIENDLY PRICING Laser shows are unique entertainment options with pricing similar to buying a house or planning a wedding—you need details to get an accurate quote. Different needs and budgets can be accommodated, scaling the spectacle up or down. To discuss a laser show for your event, call us at 252-764-7628 without any sales pressure. During the call, we'll discuss your objectives, desired show type (beam, graphic or combo), venue specifics, anticipated audience size, sound and power requirements, location, whether it’s a solo event, customized music needs, and your budget. Our talented programmers design shows to music and offer package deals for multi-night events, reducing the cost per night significantly. One-time shows are pricier due to fixed overheads, but shared packages or revenue-split events can make them more affordable. At Emerald Owl Productions, we aim to find the right balance for a memorable laser show experience within your budget—multiple nightly shows also hardly impact the price. Once we have the initial details, future planning becomes simpler. We strive to overcome pricing challenges and bring your event to life, so let's collaborate!
